intro: A return to the past, two loves and a second chance: to rekindle love or to leave it behind? You decide the destiny.
description:
Returning home brings back memories, emotions and an unexpected opportunity to rewrite the past. After years away, the protagonist returns to his hometown and meets two women who marked his life. One was his first love, someone he believed was destined to be by his side forever. The other, a childhood friend, whose silent love never blossomed.

As she relives moments of yesterday, she also faces the changes that time has brought: friendships that evolved, wounds that still hurt, and feelings that never completely disappeared. Each decision will influence the course of her story.

Can lost love be reborn, or is it just an echo of the past? Discover a moving tale of nostalgia, romance and second chances, where every choice will define the future.
